API_Description: Generates a tone or sound effect using the Text-To-Speech engine.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'qTone' suggests it is related to generating a tone or sound. Given the context of the TTS object, it likely uses the TTS engine to produce this sound.
Returns: A boolean indicating success or failure of generating the tone.
Returns_Reason: Methods that perform an action often return a boolean to indicate whether the action was successful, especially when no other return value is obvious.
